title: Brand New Luxury Condo w/ Views; Roof Deck
posting_body: Please contact agent to schedule a showing or with any questions.
Never-before lived in new construction.
Available for move in mid-August.
Be the first to move into this brand new building in Polk Gulch/Lower Nob.
Unit 404 is a brand new 1 bedroom 1 bathroom featuring views and a bright western exposure.
All units feature air conditioning, wide plank oak flooring, and high ceilings throughout.
Modern kitchens with stone countertops and appliances by Fisher and Paykel including a range, dishwasher, refrigerator, and microwave.
Common area amenities include an elevator serving all floors including the roof which features a large rooftop patio with BBQ.
Bike parking available.
Compact parking space in garage is $300 /mo.
additional.
rent - 1.5x rent security deposit - 1 year lease
- tenant pays own electricity - webpass internet available for $50 /mo.
additional
- 1 pet (cat or dog) under 30 lbs.
ok - Parking available for additional monthly rent
